title: Commentary on Vervaeke & VanderKlay Convo of 5.13.20 - Subjectivity, Dialogos, Quality
description: Great conversation that JV and PVK had. I noticed as always some overlap with Pirsig, plus some general reflections. Also PVK and Scott Adams.
